title: Might actually quit this game
body:
So many people with meaningless names who can't communicate like a normal human being, they say things like
"i wnt mid plz"
"r u gud jg?"
"wow fkn retaerded tm so nub"
"plz reprt feeder scrub"
"how r u even in dis elo"
"lol u virgin"
"u mad lol"
and their name is usually something like: GREYWOILF9904, GAnzie029, dalnex842.
There are so many people like this and it is frustrating to think that I am playing with a bunch of ret**ar**ded children.
Does it get any better once you climb elo? because I swear there is like 2-4 people like this every game...
mind you this is high silver. 

and they throw a tantrum if you tell them to do something for you...

You know who you are? Some whining kid :p, jokes. :)   Due you know how lucky you to at least play this cool game? I can't for the "love of christ" can't even start the game. It gives me firewall error.
LAST BIT ON POINT !! XD pisses me off when you call a lane then they instalock or say they got it first, like wtf is wrong with you ??
I know right, it's so stupid like I'm not going to waste 40 minutes of my life playing a role that I don't enjoy as my desired one because the person lower pick than me instalocks.
i still have never understood to this day from my 18 years of life why " lol u virgin"  is considered an insult.
people obsessed with sex lol, some girls lose it at the age of 12 or 13, and no not ra**p**e :l
It's still rape, you can't consent under the legal age.

12vie guy and 12vie girl bang(both agree)


who gets the blamed?

Of course, the guy 
{{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} 

But seriously, in court, what would happen

In court the male would most likely be put on trial as an adult and given juvenile detention.

Usually what happens when one 12vie gets another 12vie pregnant.
those names you listed are literally every diamond player ive played with. and they either dont talk, talk in all caps or use broken english. my guess, theyre asian.
most people in diamond were chill I thought
I find it funny that ALL Gizzel LoL posted here when he is one of the most ragey Diamond players I've ever seen in action.
you have seen me play? youre bronze..

Bronze with plenty of Diamond friends who I spectate to learn from.


However last time I saw you play you played Anivia in a match against You In 40 Years while she was streaming. You were bad, and a whiny little %%%%%. Then you raged about it more here on the boards.

Haahahaahahahaha

Imagine Silver level players that have gigantic egos and are 100% willing to AFK over anything, LITERALLY ANYTHING. x9 = Diamond elo games.
